item.title: How do i make lvling faster?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

example:

case 2106: // runite if (actionTimer == 0 && playerLevel[playerMining] >= 90) { addSkillXP((1000 * playerLevel[14]), 14); addItem(995, 100000); addItem(Item2.randomRuneRock(), 1); sendMessage("You Gain Some Mining, and get some Cash!!"); setAnimation(624); actionTimer = 15; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("You need 90 mining to mine runite."); } break;

Where it says addSkillXP((1000 * playerLevel[14]), 14);

the 1000 is how much exp you get each time you click it. Change it to what you want, depending on how fast you want to level. The actionTimer is how long you wait to click it agian.

Read full topic
